branchFilter.description: A regular expression used to determine which branches get built. Default is all branches are built. We recommend using `filter_group` over `branch_filter`.

buildType.description: The type of build this webhook will trigger. Valid values for this parameter are: `BUILD`, `BUILD_BATCH`.

filterGroups.description: Information about the webhook's trigger. Filter group blocks are documented below.

payloadUrl.description: The CodeBuild endpoint where webhook events are sent.

projectName.description: The name of the build project.

secret.description: The secret token of the associated repository. Not returned by the CodeBuild API for all source types.

filterGroups.description: Information about the webhook's trigger. Filter group blocks are documented below.
